name: Weaponized Express
description:
The year is 2090 and the Cold War hasn't ended. Both sides are racing to develop a more deadly weapon than their adversary. From their research, a new form of killer robots has started swarming the planet. They are ruthless and bloodthirsty, but what's more important, they are very stupid and have no notion of strategy. Your best chance of wiping them out? A World War 1-era armored train, equipped with modern automatic weapons. Looking only to rip apart the fleshy driver, the robots are unable to stop you by destroying the tracks. For now...

Game idea and programming by me

Art, additional ideas and help by frox6216 (https://itch.io/profile/frox6216)

Uses .NET Core, C# and MonoGame + OpenGL

Font downloaded from https://www.1001fonts.com/adler-font.html (free for commercial use)

https://github.com/ebosnjak/Weaponized
